context: race & place: the impacts of racial inequality on substance use and hiv outcomes in los angeles abstract it is well established that racial disparities in hiv care outcomes and use of substances among sexual minority men (smm) of color persist because of structural racism in los angeles county (lac). furthermore, we know accessible, comprehensi
title: Race & Place: The Impacts of Racial Inequality on Substance Use and HIV Outcomes in Los Angeles
explanation: The term "racial inequality" is used in the context of a scientific grant proposal investigating the impact of racial disparities on health outcomes (substance use and HIV) among a specific population (sexual minority men of color) within a defined geographic area (Los Angeles County). The reference to structural racism causing these disparities further supports its scientific application in understanding health outcomes.

title: The Racial Gap in Entrepreneurship and Business Ownership
explanation: The term 'racial inequality' is used in the context of an academic research project investigating the disparity in entrepreneurship and business ownership between racial groups, employing data analysis and scientific methods.
